description: ff. 177. 278 x 185; 195 x 125 mm. 27 lin. 16th cen. Commentary on his abridgment of Taḥrīr al-manqūl wa-tahdhīb ʻilm al-uṣūl of ʻAlī ibn Sulaymān al-Mardāwī (cf. Brockelmann, GAL, S II, 130; Shaṭṭī, Mukhtaṣar (1339 H.), p. 69).
author: Ibn al-Najjār, Taqī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1492 or 3-1564 or 5.
title: al-Kawkab al-munīr sharḥ Mukhtaṣar al-Taḥrīr.
creator: Ibn al-Najjār, Taqī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1492 or 3-1564 or 5.
subject: Ibn al-Najjār, Taqī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad, 1492 or 3-1564 or 5.—Mukhtaṣar al-Taḥrīr.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
